title: PREMIUM-Ep. 268: Neil Postman's "Amusing Ourselves to Death" (Part Two)
description:
Continuing on Amusing Ourselves to Death: Public Discourse in the Age of Show Business with guest Brian Hirt. Is the written word really so much more suited for providing context than television?

To hear the full second part, you'll need to go sign up at partiallyexaminedlife.com/support.
